item: Went to a concert or theater alone.
Chose to spend a day by myself.
Went on a trip by myself.
Spent an entire vacation by myself.
Let a child win a game.
Took a child on an outing.
Read a story to a child.
Read the comics to a child.
Read a book about the things that I collect.
Bought a book about the things that I collect.
Sent a message by electronic mail (e-mail).
Looked up information on the Internet.
Sang or played an instrument in public.
Attended an opera or a concert.
Attended a stage play or musical.
Drank whiskey, vodka, gin, or other hard liquor.
Drank in a bar or night club.
Did yoga or other movement exercises.
Spent more than 10 minutes thinking about what to wear.
Spent more thanan hourthinking about what to wear.
Bought a fashionable item of clothing.
Read a book on a financial topic.
Bought or sold stocks or bonds.
Purchased a commodity as an investment.
Ate food while walking or working.
Gambled on a slot machine or video poker game.
Bet money on a sports event.
Learned a new board or card game.
Bought plants for a garden or yard.
Composted food scraps or yard waste.
Walked or rode a bicycle to work.
Changed a habit to have less impact on the environment.
Used both sides of a piece of paper before discarding it.
Baked a cake, pie, cookies, or bread.
Listened to music on the radio.
Bathed or groomed a pet animal.
Donated money to a political campaign or cause.
Volunteered for a club or organization.
Wrote a letter to a newspaper or politician.
Read in bed before going to sleep.
Read an entire book in one sitting.
Read the Bible or other sacred text.
Gave a blessing at a meal.
Attended a church or religious service.
Listened to a religious program on the radio or TV.
Read a book about religion or spirituality.
Enrolled in a course of study.
Spent 10 minutes or more in a non-grocery store.
Spent an hour or more in a non-grocery store.
Checked the sales ads in a newspaper.
Read newspaper ads for non-grocery items.
Used eBay to buy or sell something.
Used a computer for social networking.
Made an entry on a personal web-page.
Participated in an online discussion group.
Used instant messaging to chat online.
Stayed in a hotel, motel, or resort.
Went on a cruise or tour.
Watched an educational channel on TV.
Looked up a word in a dictionary.
Read the editorial page of a newspaper.
Looked something up in an encyclopedia.
Read a car magazine or book.
Bought a car, truck or motorcycle.
Raced a car, truck or motorcycle.
Made an entry in a diary or journal.
Put pictures in a photo album.
